query:
select
                    c.id,
                    redirect_uri.redirect_uri,
                    c.insertion_time,
                    user.name,
                    c.scope,
                    c.authentication_time,
                    c.nonce,
                    c.pkce_challenge,
                    c.pkce_challenge_method
                from authorization_code c
                join user on user.id = c.user
                join redirect_uri on redirect_uri.id = c.redirect_uri
                where c.code = $1
                and c.client = (
                    select client.id
                    from client
                    where client.client_id = $2
                )
